sentences.english: Make a one-off donation to help needy children in Hong Kong and rural China.
sentences.chinese: 一次過捐款，幫助中港及中國貧困地區有需要的兒童。

sentences.english: A rail and road dual-purpose locomotive, Taichung Harbour.
sentences.chinese: 臺中港內作業的鐵公路二用小型機車。

sentences.english: China-Hong Kong English School is a school.
sentences.chinese: 中港英文學校是一所學校。

sentences.english: The newspapers from both languages complement each other in helping readers to better understand China.
sentences.chinese: 前者對中港臺的深度報道，能夠幫助讀者更瞭解中國。

sentences.english: I for China and Hong Kong joint venture company, located in Huadu District, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我公司爲中港合資公司，座落在廣州市花都區。

sentences.english: I understand and accept that the Hong Kong China Internship Association reserves the right of final interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 本人明白並同意中港實習生協會保留最終解釋權。
